update client_user_lease_data_correlation
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
lease_id = #{leaseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_lease_data_correlation_id = #{userLeaseDataCorrelationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update client_user_lease_data_correlation set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, lease_id = #{leaseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subject_id = #{subjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, renter_id = #{renterId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_time = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ext_info = #{extInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, environment = #{environment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_lease_data_correlation_id = #{userLeaseDataCorrelationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select user_id from ( select user_id,count(1) as ct from client_user_lease_data_correlation
status != 'DELETE'
and user_id in
#{userId}
GROUP BY user_id )a where a.ct = 1 order by user_id desc

select user_id from client_user_lease_data_correlation t where t.subject_id is not null and project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 'DELETE' and service_status != 'HISTORY'
and user_id in
#{userId}
GROUP BY user_id desc

select user_id from client_user_lease_data_correlation t
t.user_id not in ( select user_id from client_user_lease_data_correlation a where a.user_id = t.user_id and a.subject_id is not null GROUP BY user_id ) and t.renter_id is not null and t.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and status != 'DELETE' and service_status != 'HISTORY'
and user_id in
#{userId}
GROUP BY user_id desc

select user_id from client_user_lease_data_correlation t where service_status = 'HISTORY' and user_id not in ( select user_id from client_user_lease_data_correlation where service_status = 'EFFECTIVE' and (subject_id is not null or renter_id is not null) and user_id = t.user_id ) and status != 'DELETE'
and user_id in
#{userId}
and t.project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by user_id desc

select user_id userId, (select count(1) from client_user_lease_data_correlation where user_id = t.user_id) ucount, (select MAX(renter_id) from client_user_lease_data_correlation where renter_id is not null and user_id = t.user_id) rid, (select MAX(renter_id) from client_user_lease_data_correlation where renter_id is not null and service_status != 'HISTORY' and user_id = t.user_id) nrid, (select MAX(subject_id) from client_user_lease_data_correlation where subject_id is not null and service_status != 'HISTORY' and user_id = t.user_id) sid from client_user_lease_data_correlation t
status != 'DELETE' and t.user_id in
#{userId}
group by user_id
